GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.103
GSD.description:
io_uring: add a schedule point in io_add_buffers()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.103 by commit 4a93c6594613c3429b6f30136fff115c7f803af4, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit ddf0322db79c5984dc1a1db890f946dd19b7d6d9. For more details please see the references link.
